name: Space Odyssey
overview: Published in Computronic 1987/01-02, Digital Marketing PD #020 and Ballerspiele-Sammlung. Space Odyssey is a left-to-right horizontally-scrolling shooter that features a space ship resembling USS Enterprise. An action game in which reaction and fighting spirit is required. Only with targeted shots and quick ones. Evasion maneuvers can succeed in protecting Spaceship Enterprise from the meteorites and enemy attackers.
